name: Thirst of the Santasaurus
description:
the game is from an 30-degree camera angle; when the bottoms of the player and the obstacles (humans, tables, etc) touch, that counts as them hitting each other

Controls:

If using Mouse -Santasaurus lines up with your cursor vertically.

If using Keyboard-Using the arrow keys will move Santasaurus up and down. 

Tripping over tables loses a friend and causes you to trip.
